name: Ghost of Gaslight
description:
You are lost in the darkness

Find the stone to return home or be lost in the dark forever be wary of the lost souls that gonna stole your gaslight, time and life turned in a burnable sustance that allow you to survive in this forgoten place

Controls

  • use arrows to move 
  • press x(or the button in screen) to use spark magic, but keep a close eye to the timer as it gonna consume it
